\batchmode

\documentclass[a4paper]{book}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%%%% packages %%%%%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

% package list generated by doxygen -w latex
\usepackage{a4wide}
\usepackage{makeidx}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage{multicol}
\usepackage{float}
\usepackage{listings}
\usepackage{color}
\usepackage{textcomp}
\usepackage{alltt}
\usepackage{times}
\usepackage{ifpdf}
\ifpdf
\usepackage[pdftex,
            pagebackref=true,
            colorlinks=true,
            linkcolor=blue,
            unicode
           ]{hyperref}
\else
\usepackage[ps2pdf,
            pagebackref=true,
            colorlinks=true,
            linkcolor=blue,
            unicode
           ]{hyperref}
\usepackage{pspicture}
\fi
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage{doxygen}

% additional packages
\usepackage{wrapfig}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{amssymb}

% package options
\lstset{language=C++,
        inputencoding=utf8,
        basicstyle=\footnotesize,
        breaklines=true,
        breakatwhitespace=true,
        tabsize=8,
        numbers=left}
\makeindex

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%%%% custom macros %%%%%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

% Create a new DoxyImage environment, replacing the definition
% in the doxygen.sty style file. This environment uses the macros
% \LSDfigbegin and \LSDfigend to setup the figure environment.
% The definitions of \LSDfig{begin,end} are set as appropriate by
% the macros \LSDfloatfig and \LSDwrapfig. They are undefined after
% use, so that an error is generated if a \LSD*fig is not included
% before every DoxyImage environment.
\renewenvironment{DoxyImage}{%
  \LSDfigbegin%
}{%
  \LSDfigend%
  \let\LSDfigbegin\undefined%
  \let\LSDfigend\undefined%
}
\let\LSDfigbegin\undefined
\let\LSDfigend\undefined

% These macros control the type of figure created in LaTeX.
% \LSDfloatfig creates a standard floating figure, while
% \LSDwrapfig creates a wrapped figure using `wrapfig'.
% They set the appropriate values of \LSDfig{begin,end}.
% These macros are called in Doxygen documentation by the
% Doxygen aliases \floatfig and \wrapfig respectively.
% One of these aliases must be used before every use of
% the Doxygen \image command.
\def\LSDfloatfig#1#2{%
  \def\LSDfigbegin{\figure[#1]\center}%
  \def\LSDfigend{\label{#2}\endcenter\endfigure}%
}
\def\LSDwrapfig#1#2#3{%
  \def\LSDfigbegin{\wrapfigure{#1}{#2}\center}%
  \def\LSDfigend{\label{#3}\endcenter\endwrapfigure}%
}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%%%% begin document %%%%%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\setcounter{tocdepth}{3}
\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0.4pt}

\begin{document}

\hypersetup{pageanchor=false}

\begin{titlepage}
\vspace*{7cm}
\begin{center}
{\Large $projectname $projectnumber}\\
\vspace*{1cm}
{\large Generated by Doxygen $doxygenversion}\\
\vspace*{0.5cm}
{\small $datetime}\\
\end{center}
\end{titlepage}

\pagenumbering{roman}
\tableofcontents
\listoffigures

\pagenumbering{arabic}
\hypersetup{pageanchor=true}
